text:
In 2014 December, Ross and Ashley filed requests to change their surname to Ross Næss.

Previously, Simpsons was married to Pete Wentz and had a son named Bronx Mowgli Wen. Currently, Bronx lives with Ashley and Ross.

Ross is married to singer Ashlee Simpson since August 30, 2014. The couple has two children: daughter Jagger Snow Ross born on July 30, 2015, and Ziggy Blu Ross born in November 2020.

Who is Evan Ross?

Evan Rose is an award-winning actor-singer. Evan Ross is renowned for his role in According to Greta, Mooz-lum, 96 Minutes and Supremacy.

Recently in 2018, Ross and his wife Ashley Simpson released a duet collaboration, Ashlee + Evan.

Evan Ross- Birth Age, Family, Education

Rose was born on August 26, 1988, in Greenwich, Connecticut, the U.S.A. to Arne Naess Jr. and Diana Ross and they belong to the German-All-American ancestry.

He has an elder brother too- Ross Næss.

His father Arne was a businessman and mountaineer. And his mother Diana was an entertainer. They divorced in 2000. Sadly, his father, Mr. Arne Naess Jr. died in the year 2004 in an accident in Cape Town.

His mother remarried Robert Ellis Silberstein and has two children from this marriage- Tracee and Chudney. Also from his father’s second and third marriage were born Christoffer, Katinka, Leona, Nicklas, and Louis.

Education

Ross graduated from Greenwich High School, Fairfield, Greenwich, US.

Evan Ross- Career, Awards

Evan made his professional debut in the 2006 film ATL as Anton Swann. At the initial phase of his career, he appeared in several low-rated films including Pride, Line watch, Black Water Transit, etc.

He made his debut on T.V in the year 2007 and appeared in T.V film “Life Support” as ‘Amare McCarter’ for which he was nominated for the ‘NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actor in a Television Movie.’

In 2010, he appeared in the film Mooz-lum as Tariq Mahdi for which he was nominated for the ‘Black Reel Award for Best Actor.

One of his successful films was 96 Minutes which was released in 2011 where he appeared as ‘Dre’ for which he won the ‘SXSW Competition Award for Breakthrough Performance.’

Some of his recent films and T.V series include Buckout Road, and Wicked City among others.

Evan Ross- Salary, Net Worth

As an actor, Evan’s salary is $2,424,000 and above. As of 2022, his net worth is estimated to be $25 million US.

Body Stats- Height, Weight

Evan Ross has auburn hair and brown eyes. His height is 6 feet 1 inch and he weighs 72kg. His chest, biceps, and waist stats are 38-13-32 inches respectively.

Social Media

He has more than 48.9k followers on Facebook, 706k followers on Instagram, and 179k followers on Twitter.

Also know more about the early life, career, net worth, relationships, and controversies of other actors including Jay Hernandez, Colin Donnell, James Preston, William Brent, and A. J. Trauth.
